meanings.sent1: My gramps always tells the best stories.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my gramps on weekends.
meanings.sent3: Gramps fell asleep in his chair again, snoring softly.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree in the backyard stood tall like a protective gramps.
meanings.sent5: Every Christmas, gramps would sneak us extra cookies.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for an older man, especially one's grandfather.
meanings.sent1: Hey gramps, can you help me fix my bike?
meanings.sent2: My gramps always has a pocket full of candies for me.
meanings.sent3: Gramps tried to dance at the family reunion, causing laughter all around.
meanings.sent4: The wise old owl in the story reminded me of my gramps.
meanings.sent5: Gramps's warm hugs made everything better when I was sad.
